snippet: Barcelona Coach Gerardo Martino said he was stepping down after his team tied Atlético Madrid, 1-1, and finished the season without a major trophy for the first time since 2008.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Atletico Madrid rallies for a thrilling 1-1 draw at Barcelona to secure its first Spanish league title in 18 years; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: Barcelona Coach Gerardo Martino said he was stepping down after his team tied Atlético Madrid, 1-1, and finished the season without a major trophy for the first time since 2008.

headline.main: Atlético Madrid Rallies to Win Spanish League Title; Barcelona Coach Quits
headline.print_headline: Atlético Madrid Rallies for First Liga Title Since ’96; Barcelona Coach Quits
